snippet: Steve Fehr, the general counsel of the players' union, called Tuesday's meeting "the best day we've had," and Bill Daly, the N.H.L. deputy commissioner, thanked players for their efforts.
abstract: Steve Fehr, the general counsel of the players' union, called Tuesday's meeting "the best day we've had," and Bill Daly, the N.H.L. deputy commissioner, thanked players for their efforts.

headline.main: A Small Group Approach in the N.H.L. Talks
